data.title: HOT burgers and HOT fries
data.text: great burgers and fries!!!we stopped in on Saturday for the first time and it was so good we came back on Sunday!! Both times we went thru the drive thru, staff was very friendly and accommodating !!! We're not close by  but we'll be back!!!!👍👍

data.title: Great burgers and wonderful french fries.
data.text: Love their burgers and French fries.  Prices are good and you get a lot of fries with your order.   Eat here on a regular basis and it is always good.

data.title: Turtle Sundae
data.text: Sometimes you need an ice cream treat like a Turtle Sundae. Service is fast and efficient. Really enjoy the ice cream or custard as they call it.

data.title: Freddy's Athens
data.text: Great place for burgers and shakes! Food was great and reasonably priced. Service was quick and everyone was nice. Will come here again for sure!

data.title: Awesome!!
data.text: This is a very friendly location. Always glad to see you come in the door. The food is always great. I have never had a bad meal or service at this location. Burgers and fries are the best!!!

data.title: Retro Fast Food, but better
data.text: Have recently visited this location twice for lunch.  Burgers are juicy and fries are hot.  Double burger combo seems to be a popular standard.  Suggest ask that they hold the mustard unless you prefer that on your burger.  There is a drive-thru, but inside is spacious and clean.  I tried the fish and chips which seems to be a test item on the menu.  It was cooked right and was not greasy.  I will go back.

data.title: Fast food but tasty
data.text: Recently stopped for a quick lunch. Facility was clean and service was efficient. Food was good for fast food.

data.title: Relive 1950's diner style
data.text:
I always get the chili cheese fries without the onion rings, they are delish, steakburgers are good also.

Could do without so many items on the menu, makes it difficult to decide.

data.title: First trip...will return
data.text: I wanted a quick dinner to take back to my hotel room on a business trip.  I ran through the drive through at Freddy's.  I was a little intimidated by all on the menu, but simply made the decision for burger and fries.  I had never heard of the restaurant, but would compare it to a Steak n' Shake.  I can see where it would be a very kid-friendly place.

data.title: We made two trips to Freddy's yesterday: our first and our last!
data.text:
My wife described her chicken sandwich as hand's down the worst sandwich she's ever had. It was worse than tasteless. On top of that, we had to find mayonnaise to put on it, the tomato was tiny, and the lettuce was shredded.
My double steakburger was nondescript with little taste to it was well. It had no condiments in the form of mustard, ketchup, or mayo on it. The mini "milkshake" was the same size and consistency of a Wendy's small Frostee and cost $3.98 instead of $1. It was not a milkshake by any use of the term but custard drawn from a machine. 
It looks like they are trying emulate Culvers or Steak 'n Shake but doing a terrible job of it. 
A friend of mine warned me about Freddy's and he was right-on--don't go there if you want a decent, inexpensive meal!

data.title: Enjoyed this restaurant
data.text: Establishment is clean. Personnel are friendly. Unlike a lot of fast food places, they brought our food out to us (not a usual practice, but they weren't too busy & kitchen payed attention to who ordered, so then brought our food out). Onion rings weren't full of grease. Everything tasted good. Just wished my patty wasn't squished flat. Will plan to go there again when we are in town next.

data.title: Pleasantly surprised!
data.text: Food was FAST and delicious. Make sure you get some ice cream. The fries are very thin but delicious especially with the fry sauce. You won't be disappointed.

data.title: A step below Steak and Shake
data.text: It looked cool from the highway out of Athens and we were hungry, so what the heck. The shoestring fries I will say we're hot and delicious. The burgers were thin and flavorless, and had more grease than anything I've even eaten. The hot dog was, well, just a hot dog. I'm from Atlanta, so a place without Coke is hard for me.  The men's restroom had an odor. The frozen custard may be good, but I just wanted to leave.

data.title: Great service and good food
data.text: Wow. If you want a hot dog, hamburger, French fries, onion rings, ice cream or similar type good food, head to Freddy's in Athens. The atmosphere is "fast food" with a lot of pictures and stories about the beginnings and history of Freddy's.  The service is fast and workers are always looking out for you to make sure you have a good experience and meal. I will go back for another chili dog and rings.

data.title: Yummy and great service!
data.text: The food is similar to Steak and Shake (a little more expensive) but the service is outstanding!  Not only was everything prepared just as ordered it was prepared quickly.  The employees are friendly and the manager frequently checks in just to make sure everything is good.  Their calorie laden "Concretes" are AWESOME!

data.title: Neat Place with good food!
data.text: Came into town and tried Freddy's for the first time.  This is a very clean restaurant with friendly and helpful staff.  My wife had a great grilled cheese on rye and my son had an awesome steakburger.  I had a veggie burger that was good.  There were not too many healthy choices, but you know its not that kind of place.  We didn't have any ice cream but it all looked really good.  We will definitely be going back to Freddys!! I spent about $23 for three people.
